channel.title: Weed hurt your stomach reallllllllyyyy bad?
channel.description:
Ok Well I have smoked Weed about 3 different times. (the 3rd time I got the highest). But OK, My first time all went well then a couple of days later I had extreme stomach pains where I was doubled over and shit. Went to hospital and nothing was wrong from what they could see. (Remembering I've had my stomach cut open to fix my bladder from my wreck and my stomach is still a bit sensitive). Well the second time I did it, I did it by myself and nothing with my stomach happened. Well friday I smoked 2 bowls and got really high and saturday I smoked a j which we rolled out of notebook paper (terrible). Well that night at about 10 PM (smoked last at about 10 in the morning) my stomach started hurting reallllly fucking bad again. Went to hospital and it stopped at about 1am. Im not sure if its from smoking weed or what.. maybe you guys would know?
tl;dr stomach hurts after smoking weed 2/3 times.

item.title: Weed hurt your stomach reallllllllyyyy bad?
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:21, topic:331228”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=427588.msg3145822#msg3145822 date=1268031375]

Notebook paper? You deserve to be in the hospital dipshit… Get a can or something if your that desperate.
[/quote]sorry bro, a can is worse smoking out of, don’t give out facts you know nothing about

I wasn’t implying it was more/less healthy.

As you can see here I had no idea why I told him he deserved to be in a hospital, my only argument is that in my opinion a can is much better then notebook paper (not health wise, but quality/taste, although weed from a can hits harder imo)[/quote]tru enuf, it’ll get u way fucken higher than a ‘joint’

[quote=“Uriko, post:18, topic:331228”]stop swallowing smoke bro, inhale it to your lungs bro[/quote][quote=“Greeny, post:23, topic:331228”]Are you trying to swallow the smoke? :D[/quote]shoulda just empty quoted me twatface!!!

item.title: Weed hurt your stomach reallllllllyyyy bad?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:20, topic:331228”][quote author=Newty link=topic=427588.msg3145803#msg3145803 date=1268028636]
Notebook paper? You deserve to be in the hospital dipshit… Get a can or something if your that desperate.
[/quote]sorry bro, a can is worse smoking out of, don’t give out facts you know nothing about[/quote]

I wasn’t implying it was more/less healthy.

As you can see here I had no idea why I told him he deserved to be in a hospital, my only argument is that in my opinion a can is much better then notebook paper (not health wise, but quality/taste, although weed from a can hits harder imo)

<Uriko> lol @ idiot newty telling him to use a can instead of paper
<Uriko> noob newty
<newty> he was using notebook paper
* Aaron (~Aaron@8F94B9FF.6E110EDF.F4F6DDA7.IP) has joined #mopar
<Uriko> yea bro
* Aaron (~Aaron@8F94B9FF.6E110EDF.F4F6DDA7.IP) has left #mopar
<Uriko> not as harmful as smoking from can
<newty> it burns to fast
<newty> was my point
<newty> and tastes like shit
<Uriko> clearly it wasn't as you said 'you deserve to be in a hospital' rifk
<Uriko> which would imply ur post was about health reasons
<newty> no
<newty> i meant it was stupid
<newty> and his stupitidy 
<Uriko> i thought u meant that it burned too fast
<newty> well fuck
<Uriko> make up ur mind girlfriend
<newty> donno where i was goin with it
<newty> tbh
<Uriko> looooooooooool
<newty> rep--
<newty> well anyways imo id rather use a can then notebook paper
<newty> but then  again
<newty> when i 1st started smokin i once used paper towel
<newty> so ineffective
<Uriko> ur supposed to baptise (wet) a joint lightly before you smoke it
<Uriko> hence notebook paper would burn as effectively as zigzags

item.title: Weed hurt your stomach reallllllllyyyy bad?
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

goatee:

Is bible paper actually good? Or am I going to end up with a fast burning fail?

It probably depends on the bible. The one I used was a bit thicker than rolling paper, so it burned just fine. Make sure you pack the weed in there tightly, and if you get little runs burning down just lick your finger and touch it.

item.title: Weed hurt your stomach reallllllllyyyy bad?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Is bible paper actually good? Or am I going to end up with a fast burning fail?

My sister had this bible that some distant relatives gave her when she was like 2, and it came in this little box, so for a sick hiding place i riped out all the pages so its just the cover inside the box, looks like a book and you can put random shit in it. And now I have loads of bible pages!!

Keep a bible handy; good thin rolling papers when needed.

Fuck yeah man, I use bibles for all my joints now.
[/quote]
And then Jesus said to his disciples: ‘Take this, all of you, and smoke it. This is a plant I have cultivated which will be given up for you’.[/quote]
Can just see me at the gates of heaven with a video player of my life and an evaluator.
“All seems fin-… did you just rip out a page of the bible…, fill it with Marijuana… and smoke it?.. OH MY GOD ARE YOU HAVING SEX WITH A DUDE?”
